div.p: THIS MAGNIFICENT CAPE COD HAS ALL THE AMENITIES YOU COULD EVER DREAM OF. THE LUXURIOUS 1ST FLOOR MASTER SUITE FEATURES A 2 WAY FIREPLACE & JETTED PLATFORM TUB. GOURMET KITCHEN W/GRANITE COUNTER TOPS & STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES INCLUDING DOUBLE OVENS. A WROUGHT IRON SPINDLE STAIRCASE LEADS TO ENORMOUS 2ND FLOOR BEDROOMS AND A COZY LOFT W/BONUS FIREPLACE. 3 CAR SIDE ENTRY GARAGE, SOD, SPRINKLERS AND HARDWOOD FLOORS.

THIS MAGNIFICENT BUILDERS MODEL HAS ALL OF THE AMENITIES YOU COULD EVER DREAM OF. GORGEOUS COBBLESTONE EXTERIOR FACADE. GOURMET KITCHEN W/CHERRY CABINETS, GRANITE COUNTER TOPS, A DOUBLE ISLAND AND GE PROFILE STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES. CUSTOM 2 STORY MANTLE IN THE GREAT ROOM, CROWN MOLDING THROUGHOUT, TONS OF RECESSED LIGHTS. 4 BEDROOMS AND 2 1/2 BATHS, 2ND FLOOR LAUNDRY, DUAL STAIRCASE.

THIS COLOSSAL SIZED HOME HAS 3900 SQ FT OF LUXURIOUS LIVING SPACE. THE GOURMET KITCHEN INCLUDES GRANITE COUNTERS, HARDWOOD FLOORS, AND STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES. THE HUGE MASTER SUITE FEATURES A COZY FIREPLACE, 23 FT LONG CLOSET AND CORNER JETTED TUB. TO TOP IT OFF, FORMAL LIVING ROOM AND DINING ROOM, SEPARATE OFFICE/DEN, 9 FT FIRST FLOOR CEILINGS, JACK-N-JILL SUITE, BASEMENT PLUMBED FOR BATH.

THIS EXQUISITE BUILDERS MODEL HOME FEATURES 3900 SQ FT OF ABSOLUTE LUXURY. THE GOURMET KITCHEN W/TOP END CABINETS, GRANITE COUNTERS AND GE PROFILE STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES OPENS TO AN INVITING GREAT ROOM W/A CORNER FIREPLACE. THE ENORMOUS MASTER SUITE HAS A FIREPLACE AND ELEGANT MASTER BATH W/GRANITE VANITY AND CORNER TUB. 10 FT 1ST FLOOR CEILINGS, 1ST FLOOR IN-LAW SUITE, BUTLER'S PANTRY.

THIS WELCOMING AND OPEN HOME WAS DESIGNED TO IMPRESS EVEN THE MOST SELECTIVE HOMEBUYER. 9 FT FIRST FLOOR CEILINGS, HARDWOOD FLOORS THROUGHOUT, TWO-WAY FIREPLACE NESTLED IN BETWEEN THE GREAT ROOM AND THE GOURMET KITCHEN, DUAL STAIRCASE W/OVERLOOK TO THE GREAT ROOM ONLY BEGIN TO DESCRIBE THE ELEGANT AMENITIES. THIS HOME ALSO FEATURES 4 BEDROOMS AND 3 1/2 BATHS, INCLUDING A SPACIOUS MASTER SUITE.
